verses.text: PEA ko eni, Siope, ke ke fanongo mu‘a ki he‘eku lea, Pea fokotu‘u telinga mai ki he‘eku ngaahi fakamatala kotoa.
Vakai mai, kuo u fakaava hoku ngutu, ‘Oku lea hoku ‘elelo ‘i hoku ‘ao‘ingutu.
Ko ‘eku ngaahi lea ko e totonu ‘o hoku loto; Pea ko e me‘a kuo ‘ilo ‘e hoku loungutu, ‘e laku atu ke tafesino‘ivai.
Ko e laumālie ‘o ‘Ela na‘e ngaohi au, Pea ko e hō ‘a Sātai ne ue‘i ke u mo‘ui.
Tali au, ‘o kapau te ke lava; Fakatē ke fai mo au; ‘ai ke ma‘u ho‘o tu‘u.
Vakai, ko au ‘oku ou alāanga mo koe; ko e me‘a ‘a ‘Ela Na‘e la‘usi mo au foki mei he ‘umea.
Seuke, ko hoku ngeia ‘e ‘ikai te ne fakailifia‘i koe; Pea tala‘ehai ‘e mamafa fau ‘eku tata‘o atu.
Ko eni, ko ho‘o lea na‘e tau mai ki hoku telinga, ‘Io, na‘a ku ongo‘i ho le‘o na‘e pehē mai,
“Kuo u ma‘a au, ‘o ta‘eangahala; Ko e ‘ata‘atā kita, ‘o ‘ikai ha kovi ‘iate au.
Vakai, ‘oku Ne kumi tu‘unga ke fili ‘aki au; ‘Oku Ne lau au ko hono fili.
‘Oku ne ‘ai hoku va‘e ki he ‘akau kii‘i, ‘Oku ne lama hoku ‘alunga kotoa.”
Eni, ‘i he me‘a ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai te ke totonu Ka u tali atu mu‘a; He ‘oku lahi fau ‘a ‘Elohā ki he tangata me‘a vaivai.
Ko e hā kuo ke talatalaaki ai ia? Tokua ‘oku ‘ikai te ne momo‘i fakamatala ‘ene ngaahi me‘a.
He ‘oku ai ha anga ‘e taha ‘o e lea ‘a ‘Ela: ‘Isa, ‘oku ua; ka tala‘ehai ‘oku tokanga ‘e he tangata,
‘I he ngaahi misi, ‘i ha vīsone po‘uli, Ka tō ki he kakai ha mohe ‘āvea, He‘ene fa‘a mohe ‘i he mohenga;
‘Oku ne toki tatala ‘a e telinga ‘o e kakai, ‘O ne sila‘i ai ‘ene ngaahi tākitala;
Ke fakaafe ‘a e tangata mei he‘ene fa‘ahinga fai, Pea ke fakapuli mei he tangata fita ‘ene kāfakafa.
Koe‘uhi ke ne ta‘ofi hono laumālie mei he luo, Pea ke ‘oua mole ‘ene mo‘ui he velo.
‘Oku fai foki hono akonekina ‘aki ‘a e mamahi ‘i hono mohenga, ‘O fefaka‘ī‘ī‘aki ma‘u pē hono ngaahi hui:
Pea fehi‘a ‘ene mo‘ui ki he me‘a tokoni, Pea neongo ‘ene fiekaia, ka ne fehi‘a ki he me‘akai manako.
‘Oku ‘osi‘osi hono kakano, ‘o ‘ikai kei hā, Kae ‘ilonga ‘a e ‘ū hui na‘e ‘ikai kei hā.
Toki nga‘unu atu hono laumālie ki he luo, Pea mo ‘ene mo‘ui ki he ha‘a Tāmate.
Ka ai ha toko taha ‘e tu‘u ma‘ana, Ha ‘āngelo taukapo, Ko e taha mei he toko afe, Ke fakahā ma‘a e tangata ha‘ane totonu;
Te ne toki ‘alo‘ofa ki ai, ‘o ne folofola, “Veteange, ke ‘oua te ne ‘alu hifo ki he luo: Kuo u ‘ilo ha fakamolemole‘anga.”
Tupu ‘āfa‘afa ai hono kakano, ‘o hulu ‘i ha tamasi‘i; Foki ai ia ki he taimi talavou:
Lotu ia kia ‘Elohā, ‘o ne hōifua mei ai; Ko ia ‘oku ne sio ki hono fofonga mo e mavava: Pehē ‘ene fakafoki ki he tangata ‘ene totonu.
‘Oku ne hiva saame ki he kakai, ‘o ne pehē, “Na‘a ku angahala, ‘o piko‘i ‘a e totonu,
Kuo Ne fakahaofi ‘eku mo‘ui mei he mole ki he luo, Pea ‘oku mamata ‘eku mo‘ui ki he maama.”
Vakai, ‘oku fai ‘e ‘Ela ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ni kotoa, Tu‘o ua, tu‘o tolu, ‘i he fai mo ha tangata fita;
Ke fakafoki ‘ene mo‘ui mei he luo, Ke ne maama ‘i he maama ‘a e kau mo‘ui.
Tokanga mai, Siope, fanongo kiate au: Fakalongo pē koe ka u lea ‘e au.
Kapau ‘oku ai ha‘o lea, pea tali au: Lea, he ‘oku ou faka‘amu ke ke hā tonuhia.
Ka ‘ikai, pea fanongo mai koe kiate au; Fakalongo, ka u ako kiate koe ha poto.
